Description:
What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' RFID data – you ensure our tailor-made RFID systems depict these data meaningfully.
A key element in our track and trace platform is the Turck Vilant Server, which collects and analyses data from a fixed and mobile RFID reader network. In addition, it provides a web-based user interface that, e.g., visualizes the movement of RFID-tagged assets for the user. It will be your task to develop further and design the front end of our Server applications.
You will join our skilled software team in Otaniemi, Espoo. The team works in a hybrid mode, partly from their home offices and partly from the office, so it will be up to you to choose where and how you would like to work, bearing in mind that we would like to see you at the office at a minimum once per week.

For our Product Development Center in Espoo, Finland (or remote location within Finland),
we are looking for an enthusiastic Software Engineer who will help us build a sustainable solution platform for our future growth. And that's where you come in!
About the Company
At Topcon Positioning Group, headquartered in Livermore, California, USA, we design, manufacture and distribute productivity tools for developing a brighter future. Whether cultivating the earth or building upon it, Topcon brings innovation in workflow automation and seamless connectivity of data to construction, geopositioning and agriculture industries focused on developing a sustainable tomorrow.

Description:
Elisa Data & Analytics department is responsible for development of large-scale analytics to various Elisa's business needs. We value the data and we are focused on learning how to support our customers better and want to produce experiences in our customers' everyday life.
We're looking for a Data Engineer for the Elisa Data & Analytics team to work together with our skilled Architect, Data Engineers and Scientists.
Your main project would be designing and implementing data integrations between different systems and engineering many kinds of solutions for data handling and machine learning. These complex systems require skills from data integration and solid coding experience.
In this job, you can use your skills in a creative and versatile way right at the heart of our company. You will get a chance to make your own system choices and direct development work in the right direction in line with your own vision.

Job_title: Grow as Data Engineer with us - Solita´s personalised onboarding program
Description:
Growing as a Data Engineer onboarding program helps you to boost your growth as a professional, improving your skills eg. in cloud platforms and their services, databases, data development tools and methodologies as well as more general level consulting skills. With a wider and deeper skillset you´ll have more opportunities to find meaningful and challenging projects to work in.
What Data Engineers do in Solita?
Data Engineers are all-around and end-to-end developers and consultants handling data in all its shapes and sizes in order to fulfil the end users' data needs. Data Engineers work together with the Solita team in various customer projects, where data platforms and various data utilisation solutions are built, data storages are modernised and data is processed.

Description:
Are you a skilled Data Engineer up for owning the data pipeline of an upcoming game, in line to be our second hit? Ready to join one of Europe's fastest growing game companies?

If yes, Metacore could be the right place for you
We are a Helsinki-based game company best known for our hit game Merge Mansion and our people-first company culture. Built on trust, our culture allows us to work autonomously, efficiently, and ambitiously. We have mutually agreed on five cultural norms to describe how we build trust and work as Metacore – you can find them here.

Our company’s mission is to entertain hundreds of millions of people for decades. Although we already entertain 40,000,000+ players worldwide and have grown into a team of 120+ game industry professionals in less than two years, we’re only getting started. That’s where we hope you come in: to take ownership of the data pipeline of one of our upcoming games, and ensure its reliability, scalability, and efficiency. Your expertise in data engineering, combined with your enthusiasm for data analysis, will enable you to generate informative visualizations and pursue engaging data science initiatives that enhance the team's performance.

Description:
We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to join our team in Helsinki. Data analysis and data analysis platforms (preferably with AWS)
Data pipeline design and implementation
Data lake design and implementation
Data quality assurance and verification

Description:
The ideal candidate for this opening is someone who is willing to work crossfunctionally on both data science features and data processing at an ambitious startup.

Personally, you are:
Self-motivated
Honest and passionate
Learn quickly and continously
Meeshkan employees are those who:
Communicate effectively with clients and teammates
Curious about technology and the impact it can make on the world
Tasks

Requirements

Benefits

This role works closely with Mike Meeshkan’s CEO, and with the engineering team.


1. 30 minute video call with our COO, Makenna
2. Take home exercise, if applicable
3. Video call with Mike, CEO of Meeshkan
4. Offer & "What will make you most successful in this position?"

On average the whole process takes 2-3 weeks end to end, but we're pretty flexible!

We understand the combination of backend and data science chops, is a hard one to find. Our preference is on candidates with strong backend experience, we have an incredible team of data science engineers that you can collaborate with and learn from!

Even if you don't believe you fit all of the requirements but you're interested in the product / position — please apply! We're looking forward to hearing from you.

DATA ENGINEER
Would you like to be a part of Recordly's story? Now is your chance! We’re looking for a Data Engineer who wants to get their hands dirty with different data solutions, platforms, and pipelines. Working at Recordly means you get to work with customers that truly want to make data their competitive edge. You will be at the core of helping businesses capitalize on the opportunities data offers.

“WHO/WHAT IS RECORDLY?” YOU MIGHT ASK
Recordly is an independent company party of the Futurice family specializing in business data management. Our core business focuses on data management, data architectures, and hands-on data engineering that enable exceptional user experiences, efficiency gains, and new business models. In simple terms, we tech the heck out of data.

Description:
Data Engineer
Tehtävässä olet osana tiivistä kehitys- ja ylläpitotiimiä, jonka työnä on rakentaa ja ylläpitää dataputkia sekä kehittää tietovarastointia pankkien viranomaisraportointiin. Menestymisen kannalta olennaisia ominaisuuksia ovat SQL-osaaminen, kiinnostus laajojen kokonaisuuksien hallintaan ja ongelmanratkaisuun sekä sitoutuminen jatkuvaan prosessiin, jossa dataputkia kehitetään ja automatisoidaan. Myös Azure-pilviympäristön tunteminen asettaa sinut etulyöntiasemaan.
Työn ytimen muodostavat datavirran end-to-end hallinnointi lähdejärjestelmistä raportointiin sekä datan jalostaminen käyttökelpoiseen muotoon. Käsiteltävä data liittyy mm. pankkien rahoitusinstrumentteihin ja datan käyttökohteet liittyvät pääosin pankkien riskienhallintaan ja viranomaisraportointiin, joten kiinnostus finanssialaa kohtaan ja ymmärrys pankkiliiketoiminnasta katsotaan eduksi. Tarkka tehtäväsi muotoutuu oman osaamisesi perusteella - tietovarastoinnin syväosaajana pääset aiheen vaikeiden kehitystehtävien pariin ja Azure-osaajana pääset toteuttamaan tietovarastointia myös pilvessä.

Description:
Työpaikan kuvaus
Haluaisitko rakentaa aikaa kestäviä dataratkaisuja ja kehittää pilvipohjaisia palveluja yhdessä muiden huippuasiantuntijoidemme kanssa? Olisimmeko me match made in data cloud? Jos sinulla on pää pilvissä mutta jalat maassa, saatat olla datatekemisemme hopeareunus.
Rekrytoimme aina sopivien dataosaajien osuessa kohdalle ja keskustelemme mielellämme kanssasi siitä, olisitko juuri sinä sopiva lisä tiimiimme. Data Engineerinä osallistut pilvipohjaisten tietoalustojen, dataputkien ja rajapintapalveluiden suunnitteluun, kehittämiseen ja ylläpitoon. Asiakasprojekteissamme teemme dataratkaisuja Snowflakeen, AWS:ään ja Azureen ja hyödynnämme lisäksi mm. GCP:tä ja SQL:ää. Asiakasprojektimme ovat monipuolisia, ja asiakastiimeissämme on asiakkuuden tai projektin koosta riippuen usein myös analytiikkakonsultteja, jotka visualisoivat dataa loppukäyttäjille, sekä web-kehittäjiä.

Description:
Who We Are

Boston Consulting Group partners with leaders in business and society to tackle their most important challenges and capture their greatest opportunities. BCG was the pioneer in business strategy when it was founded in 1963. Today, we work closely with clients to embrace a transformational approach aimed at benefiting all stakeholders—empowering organizations to grow, build sustainable competitive advantage, and drive positive societal impact.

Our diverse, global teams bring deep industry and functional expertise and a range of perspectives that question the status quo and spark change. BCG delivers solutions through leading-edge management consulting, technology and design, and corporate and digital ventures. We work in a uniquely collaborative model across the firm and throughout all levels of the client organization, fueled by the goal of helping our clients thrive and enabling them to make the world a better place.

Description:
Etsimme tunnetulle finanssialalla toimivalle asiakasyritykselle osaajaa nimikkeellä
Data Engineer Helsinkiin
Tässä roolissa pääset luomaan uusia tietoaineistoja, joihin asiakkaan liiketoiminnan vastuullisuustyö pohjautuu. Työskentelet datatuotteen toteutuksen parissa, johon kuuluu tietovirtojen, mallien, tietokantojen ja rajapintojen kanssa työskentelyä. Kokemus skaalautuvasta tiedon laadun varmistamisesta on eduksi.
Tehtävässä auttaa menestymään kokemus sidosryhmien kanssa työskentelystä, analyyttisyys, ratkaisukeskeisyys, kyky priorisoida tehtäviä, sekä vahvat kommunikointi- ja yhteistyötaidot.
Osaaminen seuraavista teknologioista ja kielistä on toivottua:

Our team is comprised of four professionals. Each member has own specialized area, but we collaborate and support each other in technical challenges and in the development of best practices. We work in a hybrid model with broad remote work possibilities, but on-site meetings are required about twice per month. This is a permanent position. Start date is negotiable, but preferably in May 2023.
Working in the Data Integration Team, activities may include:
Expanding our standard data offering to the organization
Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems
Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data provided to our users

Description:
Why We Work at Dun & Bradstreet
Dun & Bradstreet unlocks the power of data through analytics, creating a better tomorrow. Each day, we are finding new ways to strengthen our award-winning culture and accelerate creativity, innovation and growth. Our 6,000+ global team members are passionate about what we do. We are dedicated to helping clients turn uncertainty into confidence, risk into opportunity and potential into prosperity. Bold and diverse thinkers are always welcome. Come join us!

Overview

We are strengthening our Data Operations team in Finland and looking for a Consumer Data Specialist. Data Operations is responsible for sourcing and acquiring new data, understanding the processes that generate the data we have, continuously improving the data quality, operating manual data processes, and supporting our clients and the organization in the availability and usability of our data assets.

Description:
Etsimme kokeneita Data Engineeraja työskentelemään sekä pohjoismaissa että kansainvälisesti vaikuttavissa asiakasprojekteissa. Meillä pääset suunnittelemaan ja toteuttamaan moderneja data-ratkaisuja pilvipalveluiden päälle. Suomessa tukenasi on 50 hengen data- , ohjelmistokehitys-, design- sekä strategiatyön osaajien työyhteisö.
Arki Data Engineerinä
Meillä työskentelet yhdessä Thoughtworksin tiimin kanssa asiakasprojekteissa. Pääset työskentelemään Thougthworksiläisten kanssa vaihtelevissa projekteissa, jotka kestävät pääasiassa muutamasta kuukaudesta puoleen vuoteen, mutta löytyy meiltä pidempiäkin projekteja. Asiakasprojekteissamme rakennetaan muun muassa tietovarastoja, kerätään datoja asiakkaan järjestelmistä ja jalostetaan niistä asiakkaan datastrategiaa palvelevia datatuotteita. Työskentelet yhdessä Data Scientistien kanssa ja pääset rakentamaan dataputkia osana koneoppimisen ja tekoäly-projektien toteuttamista (käsittää esimerkiksi koneoppimista, lineaarista ohjelmointia, generatiivista mallinnusta, syy-seurauspäättelyä/kausaalipäättelyä).

Description:
Etsimme joukkoomme Data Engineeria mielenkiintoisten asiakashankkeiden pariin. Asiantuntijuus, tiimihenki ja ystävällisyys kuvastavat meitä hiqlaisia, samaa odotamme myös uudelta tiimiläiseltämme.
Data Engineerina työskentelet osana asiakastoimituksiamme. Laajasta asiakasverkostostamme löytyy keskisuuria ja suuria suomalaisia yrityksiä monilta eri toimialoilta.
Olemme erikoistuneet korkealaatuisiin digitaalisiin palveluihin, konsultointiin ja projektitoimituksiin. Ohjelmistokehitys, design, automaatio, dataosaaminen, pilvipalvelut, laadunvarmistus ja jatkuvat palvelut kuuluvat kaikki erityisosaamiseemme.
Kehittäjiltämme odotamme asiantuntemusta ja aitoa intoa teknologiaa kohtaan. Asiakaslähtöisyys ja tiimityöskentelytaidot ovat meidän asiakkuuksissamme avainasemassa. Innostava työyhteisö ja asiantunteva tiimi sekä aktiivinen kompetenssinkehitys ja tiedonjako tukevat onnistumista.

Description:
Data Center Critical facilities Engineer II
Equinix is the world’s digital infrastructure company, operating 240+ data centers across the globe and providing interconnections to all the key clouds and networks. Businesses need one place to simplify and bring together fragmented, complex infrastructure that spans private and public cloud environments. Our global platform allows customers to place infrastructure wherever they need it and connect it to everything they need to succeed.
We are a fast-growing global company with 20 years of consecutive quarterly growth* . Through our innovative portfolio of high-performance products and services, we have created the largest, most active global ecosystem of 10,000+ companies, including 2,100 networks and 3,000+ cloud and IT service providers in 32 countries spanning six continents.

Description:
Are you interested in working on the leading financial management product in Finland? Netvisor is looking for an ambitious Data Engineer to build a greenfield data platform.
Netvisor SaaS-products already serve over 30 000 businesses in Finland; over 1 million invoices are sent and 135 000 payslips are created monthly. Visma Solutions Oy is also a unicorn company with a revenue of 104M € in 2022.
Who are we looking for?
You have experience building ETL pipelines and applying modern data modelling techniques. You are proactive, collaborative and an excellent problem solver. You value teamwork but can take ownership and contribute independently, when necessary.
Our working language is English, and we expect good communication skills in both written and spoken English. Finnish skills are not mandatory, but they may help when you come across some of our existing data.

Description:
Are you ready to take care of the world’s tech?

Location: Helsinki or Tampere

We are 3stepIT
At 3stepIT we have a very clear purpose: to take care of the world’s technology. As a Technology Lifecycle Management provider, we have an ambition to reduce e-waste by helping businesses to consume technology more sustainably. We offer an end-to-end approach to accessing, managing and refreshing IT devices that is cost-efficient, secure and environmentally friendly. Today we serve more than 3,000 customers worldwide and play an active role in the circular economy by refurbishing and reselling end of life IT devices. In doing so, we prevent over half a million devices from being destroyed and sent to landfill each year.

Description:
Murata Finlands Data Integration Team is currently expanding its Standard Data and Advanced Data Tools offerings throughout the organization. We are looking for a Data Integration Engineer to help Murata proceed in our Digital Transformation and to support and enhance Smart Manufacturing.
Our team is comprised of four professionals. Each member has own specialized area, but we collaborate and support each other in technical challenges and in the development of best practices. We work in a hybrid model with broad remote work possibilities, but on-site meetings are required about twice per month. This is a permanent position. Start date is negotiable, but preferably in May 2023.
Working in the Data Integration Team, activities may include
Expanding our standard data offering to the organization

Description:
Löytyykö sinusta draivia monipuolisiin asiakasprojekteihin, joissa sinulle mahdollistetaan ammatillinen kasvu nyt ja tulevaisuudessa?
Oletko tietomallinnuksen ja/tai ETL- kehittämisen osaaja ja etsit itsellesi kasvumahdollisuuksia? Data- ja analytiikkaprojektiemme kasvun myötä etsimme Data Engineeria kehittämään asiakkaidemme liiketoimintaa.
Mistä on kyse?
Data & Analytics -liiketoiminnallamme on pitkä kokemus analyyttisista sovelluksista, joissa suurten tietomassojen käsittely ja hallinta ovat arkipäivää. Suunnittelemme ja toteutamme asiakkaillemme tiedonhallinnan ja analytiikan ratkaisuja, jotka palvelevat ja mahdollistavat monipuolisen tiedon hyödyntämisen suoraan liiketoiminnan tarpeisiin. Valitsemme käyttämämme teknologiat aina asiakastarpeen mukaisesti, mutta hyödynnämme ratkaisuissamme erityisesti Azurea.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Job_title: Golang System Software Engineer - Containers / Virtualisation
Description:
We are hiring a Golang software engineer to work on the low level Go codebase sitting between our REST API and the low level C libraries used to manage containers and virtual machines. We are looking for system-level developers with experience in design and data management/modeling.
The LXD team is responsible for the design, development and evolution of LXD, a modern system container and virtual machine manager that is widely used on Ubuntu, ChromeOS and other Linux platforms. LXD components span the entire software stack from low-level kernel features to the upper level management REST API and CLI.
This is an opportunity for someone who wants to have a meaningful impact on modern cloud computing technologies. Canonical offers a fun, fast-paced team environment and a career full of learning and development.

Description:
Summary
This is an exciting opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about open source software, Linux, and Web Services at scale. Come build a rewarding, meaningful career working with the best and brightest people in technology at Canonical, a growing international software company.
Canonical's Store team develops and operates the backend services that power the Snap Store and Charmhub.io marketplaces. Our services are built primarily in Python, within a bit of Golang. If you have a passion for clean APIs, have a bias towards shipping and believe that tests are the key to higher velocity and reliability, you'll fit right in.
We have some exciting challenges ahead including continuing to scale our production architecture, expand the store backend to handle additional package types, and enhance our on-prem offering for IoT and Enterprise solutions.

Description:
Drive the future of collaborative open source development tooling as part of the Launchpad team. This is an opportunity for a motivated engineer with a passion for open source software, Linux, and web services to join our distributed team.
Launchpad is a platform for managing open source development projects. It includes code hosting and review, bug tracking, package building, translations, and other facilities used by free and open source software developers. It provides essential development and collaboration infrastructure for major projects such as Ubuntu.
Launchpad is a mature project, mainly written in Python (primarily Zope, with some Flask). You'll be striking a balance between keeping our business-critical services running and expanding our feature set: among other things, we are currently working on expanding our package building capabilities, improving the development flows provided to our users, and modernising our web UI. If you love keeping large projects well-organised and well-maintained, care about supporting developers, and believe that continuous improvement is the key to innovation, higher velocity, and reliability, you'll fit right in.

Description:
R&D Engineer
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

We are looking for a R&D Engineer at ABB Oy, Large Motors and Generators division in Helsinki. You will be member of our mechanical performance team in Research and Development. In this role, you will contribute to product development projects, maintenance tasks, resolution of technical support cases by conducting simulations and measurements. You will have an opportunity to learn from experienced colleagues, grow your engineering skills in the field of mechanical simulation and measurement and take next steps in your career. You will work in an international organization in co-operation with sales, design, local and global manufacturing, and other ABB business lines. This position is located in Large Motors & Generators premises in Helsinki, Finland. Our R&D Engineers and scientists develop breakthrough technologies that change the way the world works, and industries do business. We constantly push the limits of convention, while retaining our focus on delivering solid returns for our customers and shareholders. Benefits we offer at the moment include e.g. an annual performance bonus, a flexible working model, subsidized lunch, development & training, employee share ownership program, benefits for families with children, sports, massage and cultural benefits and many hobby clubs.

Description:
Our flexible, diverse, and casual work environment stimulates change and creates a motivating environment with highly efficient people. As part of our team, you will be an integral part of creating and supporting our products. ADVA’s products are the building blocks for tomorrow’s networks, enabling the transport of increasing amounts of data across the globe. From access to the metro core, to the long haul, we create intelligent, software-automated solutions that will provide future generations with networks that can scale to meet increasing bandwidth demands. Come be a part of the world’s most cutting-edge innovative solutions and products, from design to implementation.
With a diverse team spread across the globe, we have developed a culture that embraces creativity and seeks innovation in every aspect of what we do. At ADVA, we believe in our TEAM members and work hard to ensure that every voice is always heard.
ADVA is dedicated to the health and well-being of our employees, therefore, a series of comprehensive, quality wellness programs are available to all employees. In addition to receiving an equitable salary and having an equal opportunity for professional development and advancement, as an ADVA employee, you may be eligible to enjoy other health benefits and perks, which will enhance your job satisfaction. We have designed our work and life programs around our employees because we know that they spend the majority of their life at work.

Description:
Tuotamme peleillä iloa ja suojelemme sitä. Haluamme, että suomalaisten pelaaminen pysyy ilon puolella. Tässä työssä vastuullisuus ohjaa kaikkea toimintaamme. Haluamme olla pelialan edelläkävijä ja vastuullisen pelaajakokemuksen suunnannäyttäjä. Hyvinvointi on meille sydämen asia. On tärkeää, että töihin on mukava tulla joka päivä. Meillä on monipuoliset ja laajat työsuhde-edut. Tarjoamme vaikuttavia työtehtäviä kehittyvässä työyhteisössä, jossa on iloinen tekemisen meininki. Tehdään työtä ‒ yhdessä ilon puolella.
Senior Data Engineer
Veikkauksen Data Platforms and Applications -yksikkö etsii nyt riveihinsä ennakkoluulotonta tekijää matkallemme kohti datakeskeistä tekemisen kulttuuria.
Veikkaus on asettanut itselleen tavoitteeksi olla maailman dataohjautunein rahapeliyhtiö. Tämä tarkoittaa, että kaiken tekemisen keskiöön nousee data ja siitä ammennettu ymmärrys.

Description:
Data is key for the future success of Telia Company and thus Telia Broadband Data Mediation Team is looking for a Software Engineer (node.js) for the Broadband Big Data solution area to strengthen our IP network performance management with a microservice-based events-driven data platform.
Is this your next opportunity?
Broadband Data Mediation Team is part of Telia Group IT Organization. This team is the IT solution owner for collection, mediation, and processing of the data from telecom network, IT infrastructure, IT applications, inventory systems and other data stores. These data are critical for Telia’s business and used for service assurance, investment planning, crowd analytics, security monitoring, business customer portal product offering, etc.

Description:
Paymentology is the first truly global issuer-processor, giving banks and fintechs the technology, team and experience to rapidly issue and process Mastercard, Visa and UnionPay cards across more than 50 countries, at scale.

Our advanced, multi-cloud platform, offering both shared and dedicated processing instances, vast global presence and richer, real-time data, set us apart as the leader in payments.

As a Remote Senior Software Engineer at Paymentology you'll be working in the Engineering team to build enterprise-level, highly scalable, highly secure financial processing systems that power tens of millions of transactions and tie them to web, mobile and API interfaces that make it easy for people to issue, redeem and reconcile prepaid and credit cards all over the world.

Tasks

This position requires the ability to develop high-quality and resilient solutions to meet the rapidly evolving needs of an issuer processor serving an international expanding customer base and to communicate effectively at all levels, from providing the right level of details in the status updates on your work to explaining technical trade-offs, technical complexities and design options so Paymentology can make informed decisions.

Requirements



Above all, we are looking for software engineers...

Who love to write great software

Who are passionate about their craft

Who are willing to learn, as well as coach

Let’s also not forget languages (not the programming kind); While you will work with colleagues located throughout the world, English is our company language so it's important that you be able to communicate at a fluent level, in both spoken and written form.

Flexible hours are a must for our remote team. You’ll need to be able to occasionally shift your work hours to participate into on-call duties and better align with colleagues for the scope of specific projects.

Benefits

At Paymentology we value making a difference to the lives of the people who work for us and who live in the communities where we operate. You can look forward to working with a diverse, global team where Paymentologists at all levels play an important part in our global mission to advance the world through payments and make a difference on a global scale.

Description:
Do you want to work with data and make a difference? Do you want to take part in creating world-class data platform with modern tool-set and skilled colleagues? You might be the new team member we are looking for! Join K Group’s Data Platforms & Technology team and be a part of an energetic, change-driven crew where you will be learning from but also contributing to a team of experts.

K IT is looking for a Lead Data Engineer with a focus on managing the data engineering development and operations for the modern data and event platforms. You will be participating in the actual design and development work for creating scalable and robust data solutions while leading a developer team responsible for the data platform development. You will be working in close collaboration with various other development teams, business stakeholders and IT partners. You will be working with cloud platforms incl. related data services and various modern data related technologies. You will be also contributing to the strategic planning and direction of the various data related activities at K-Group.

To succeed in this position, we hope you possess:

At K IT our working language is English and we expect that your communication skills (both written and spoken) are at good level.

The trading sector is undergoing a major transformation, and thus offers an interesting working environment and opportunities for personal development.

Why join us?



K Group is a strong and responsible operator in seven countries and we are constantly transforming and evolving. At K Group, you can build a career alongside top European trading sector professionals. We offer you interesting challenges and new perspectives every day. We take care of each other, our customers, the society and the environment.

For more information, contact Head of Data Platforms, Mikko Ollila, tel. 0408018691.
Send your application by April 2nd 2023 using the link below. We will process applicants already during the application period and fill the position as soon as a suitable person is found.

Applicants are required to take a drug test before an employment relationship can be established.

___________________
At K Group, you can build a career alongside 45,000 European trading sector experts. We operate in the grocery trade, the building and technical trade, and the car trade. Independent K-retailer entrepreneurs are the heart of our operation, and inspire the mission of the whole K Group to offer good food, make everyday life easier and make the world a better place. Through strong collaboration throughout the organisation, we are able to constantly exceed our customers’ expectations in stores, online and as a B2B partner.

Description:
HypeHype Inc. (previously Frogmind) is an award-winning independent mobile games studio from Helsinki founded in 2012. We are best known for our games BADLAND series, Badland Brawl and Rumble Stars series which have garnered over 180 million players and won multiple industry awards.
Our ambitious new goal is to enable anyone to become a game maker in the same way YouTube & Tiktok did with video creators. We are building a new social user-generated content platform for creating, remixing and playing online games with a mobile phone, tablet or desktop. HypeHype, currently in early access, offers all the tools for making modern games and takes game creation from months of complex PC development to just hours of visual editing on the go.
We are looking for a Senior Data Engineer.

Skylo Technologies is hiring a Core Network Engineer in Espoo, Finland to join our Network Operations team to implement Skylo's vision of building out a carrier-grade Satellite IOT network. This role will be highly cross-functional, working across the network engineering, wireless systems, and network operations teams. This is a terrific opportunity for someone who is interested to stretch themselves in their network domain, and see their work have immediate global impact in the wireless industry.
Responsibilities:
Work collaboratively with internal stakeholders to deploy, test, and operate Skylo's 3GPP satellite core network and its associated interfaces
Create network monitoring infrastructure and work with internal and external teams to integrate the network monitoring data with supporting operational processes

Description:
This is a Hybrid role based in Helsinki. Our office is located in Hakaniemi but you can also work remotely.

Are you ready for the Most Impactful Work of Your Life?
Working at Signant Health puts you at the very heart of the world’s most exciting sector - a high-growth, dynamic company in an extraordinary industry. We’re radically changing the clinical trial landscape, driving change through the technology and innovations we create and the services we deliver to our customers.

Our R&D Support team is growing and we’re now looking for new

R&D Support Engineer

who provides excellent internal customer service and resolves infrastructure and application incidents from production and pre-production environments which are escalated to R&D. R&D Support Engineer works the normal business hours, no shift work.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES
1.Investigates and resolves infrastructure and application incidents from production and pre-production environments which are escalated to R&D.
2.Collaborates with Product Management, Operations teams and R&D teams to ensure high quality support services for internal customers.
3.Assists, manages and triages incidents and service requests for R&D support
4.Determines root cause of issues
5.Verifies that all necessary requirements, incident details, sample data, and other supporting information is provided with each incident or service request submitted
6.Possesses or quickly gains detailed knowledge of the company’s products to effectively document and support the products
7.Tracks progress of R&D support tickets with a focus on meeting delivery deadlines
8.Collaborate with R&D teams for ensuring the appropriate resources are engaged for timely action and proper traction
9.Communicates proactively request status to internal customers
10.Provides data and reporting R&D support tickets status as needed

DECISION MAKING AND INFLUENCE

1.Helps to manage overall prioritizations between production incidents/problems, releases, and new products implementation
2.Helps to develop and implement the overall management process for the incident management
3.Advises management on situations that may require additional support or escalation
4.Follows up with internal customers to identify areas of improvement
5.Other responsibilities will be assigned as required

KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS & ATTRIBUTES


1.Bachelor’s Degree in software engineering or computer science required. Master’s Degree is a plus.
2.Minimum of four years’ experience in a software development environment
3. Strong experience working directly with customers
4. Basic knowledge of web services and API
5.Understanding of SQL language
6.Basic knowledge of scripting languages (Perl, Shell)
7.Good understanding of computer systems, mobile devices and other tech products


1.Experience working in an Agile Development environment




Want to join the Best Team of Your Life?
We’re looking for people who are excited by the potential to make a difference in the world. You don’t need to have a clinical background to thrive at Signant. You need to be decisive, open to celebrating mistakes, able to communicate transparently and inclusively, and someone your team can count on. Most of all you need to be yourself!

We know that everyone has different wants and needs, which is why we support our employees with a variety of perks and benefits. As part of our team some of the benefits you can expect to receive are:
Does this sound like the Best Work of your life? Then we’d love to hear from you!
To apply, please submit your CV as soon as possible.

Please note that Signant does not accept unsolicited resumes from Third Party vendors.
#LI-ME1
#LI-REMOTE
#LI-DNI

At Signant Health, accepting difference isn’t enough—we celebrate it, we support it, and we nurture it for the benefit of our team members, our clients and our community. Signant Health is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or veteran status.

Description:
We are looking for a Lead Data Scientist/Engineer to join our team of +35 people. You'll be involved in turning data from thousands of users into insights integrated with the product.

Data and the interpretation of it is a lifeline, the red thread, for all the things we do at Veri. You can expect to be working closely with most of the areas in the company. Some of the responsibilities you will be sharing with other members of our product teams:
Taking ownership of data-driven feature exploration, experimentation, and implementation
Working closely with our product teams and health advisors to convert business goals into data-driven products and features







(30 minutes)

We'll get a few people from the team to interview you and to touch base one last time before making a final decision. If we collectively believe there is a good fit we’ll make you an offer following our Open Compensation Model.

Description:
Toimipaikka Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Vaasa, Oulu, Lahti, Seinäjoki, Kuopio, Remote
Työkokemus Senior, Medior
Työsuhde Fulltime

Etsimme mukavaan ja kasvavaan joukkoomme kokenutta Data Engineeriä auttamaan asiakkaitamme menestymään modernien Data Platform -ratkaisujemme avulla. Roolissasi kokeneena tekijänä pääset paitsi luomaan merkityksellisiä dataratkaisuja asiakkaillemme myös jakamaan osaamistasi, kehittämään toimintamalleja sekä vaikuttamaan miten rakennamme ratkaisujamme tulevaisuudessa.

Fellowmindin tiedon hallinnan ratkaisut perustuvat erityisesti Azuren dataratkaisuihin (Data Factory, Synapse Analytics), joten arvostamme sinulta näiden tuntemusta. Odotamme sinulta kokemusta ja näkemystä isojen datakokonaisuuksien käsittelystä ja kehittämisestä sekä Data Engineering kokemusta siitä miten dataa hyödynnetäään osana operatiivista järjestelmää. Toivomme myös, että integraatiot, SQL ja DW -ratkaisut ovat sinulle tuttuja.

Arvostamme, että kokeneena osaajana jaat aihealueen osaamista sparraten nuorempia datataiteen harjoittajia ja tukien myyntiä pre-sales roolissa. Keskustelemme mielellämme siitä, että voisit ottaa Competence Lead -tason vastuita valituista kokonaisuuksista.

Vahva konsulttihenkisyys ja yhteistyökyky antaa sinulle hyvät eväät menestyä työssäsi, sillä työskentelet tiiviisti asiakkaiden eri aihealueen konsulttien kanssa. Asiakkaidemme ja ympäristömme kansainvälistyessä toivomme sinulta suomen lisäksi myös sujuvaa englannin kielen taitoa.

Miksi valitsisit juuri meidät?

Tarjoamme mahdollisuuden päästä kehittymään ja oppimaan uutta merkityksellisten asiakasprojektien parissa. Fellowmindin koulutuskonseptien (Academy, MasterClass) myötä voimme tarjota sinulle erinomaiset mahdollisuudet jakaa osaamistasi ja oppia itse uutta. Mitä uuta sinä haluaisit oppia?

Datanäkemyksemme on vahvasti asiakkaan liiketoimintaan keskittyvä; olemme ratkaisemassa asiakkaidemme ydinhaasteita. Taustallamme on kasvava ja tunnustettu tarina Suomen ykkösrivistössä, ja voimakkaasti kasvanut asiakaskuntamme on kestävällä pohjalla. Lue lisää referensseistämme esimerkiksi logistiikan, lastenvaatteiden tai vaikka vakuutusliiketoiminnan parissa.

Työskentelyysi saat vastuullisen ja itsenäisen työnkuvan sekä tiimin täyden tuen arjessa. Pääset myös tuomaan näkemyksesi miten ratkaisuja rakennetaan, myydään ja tarjotaan tulevaisuudessa. Roolia voidaan kehittää ja rakentaa osaamisesi mukaan. Meillä Fellowmindilla ei tarvitse lokeroitua boksiin!

Fellowmindilta saat myös paikan isossa kaveriporukassa! Meillä arvot eivät ole pelkkä johtoryhmän tai konsernin kasaama muodollisuus, sillä “People at Heart” toteutuu ja näkyy jokapäiväisessä tekemisessä. Teemme parhaamme, että tulet toimistolle hymyillen myöskin syksyn harmaassa aamussa.

Pasi Lepistö

Autan mielelläni, jos sinulle heräsi kysymyksiä Fellowmindin avoimista työpaikoista tai Fellowmindista työnantajana.

puh. 050 490 3670 pasi.lepisto@fellowmind.fi


Kiinnostaisiko käydä kuukausittain tunnin hieronnassa firman piikkiin taikka hankkia työsuhdepyörä? Meillä saat perinteisen lounasedun lisäksi käyttöösi Epassi Flexin (600 €/v), jonka voi käyttää haluamallasi tavalla harrastuksiin, kulttuuriin, hammaslääkäriin tai vaikka julkiseen liikenteeseen. Toimiston rahka/välipalakaapin antimet pelastavat, kun nälkä yllättää ja kuntosalijäsenyys on kaikille halukkaille otettu. Laaja työterveyssopimus kanssa sekä Auntie -palvelu tukee ihmisten hyvinvointia ja terveyttä. Opiskelemista ja itsensä kehittämistä tuetaan opiskelurahalla sekä Academy-konseptin kautta. Etuja siis piisaa ja valikoimaa kehitetään, hyvät ideat meillä on tapana toteuttaa.

Mikä Fellowmind?

Fellowmind on modernien liiketoimintajärjestelmien, pilvi- ja tietoturvaratkaisujen, datan ja tekoälyn sekä modernin työskentelyn asiantuntijayritys. Fellowmind on Euroopan johtavia Microsoft-kumppaneita ja toimii Suomessa, Ruotsissa, Tanskassa, Hollannissa, Saksassa ja Puolassa 35 eri toimipisteessä. Yrityksessä työskentelee 1750 asiantuntijaa. Fellowmind on perustettu vuonna 2005 ja sen pääomistaja on Pohjois-Euroopan johtava pääomasijoittaja FSN Capital.

Haluamme olla paitsi asiakkaidemme tulevaisuuden liiketoiminnan mahdollistaja, mutta myös työpaikka, jossa panostetaan ihmisten osaamisen kehittämiseen ja hyvinvointiin. Fellowmindilaisia työskentelee Suomen toimipisteissä Helsingissä, Tampereella, Jyväskylässä, Lahdessa, Vaasassa, Turussa, Kuopiossa, Seinäjoella ja Oulussa.

Verkostoidu kanssamme

Eikö tämä rooli ollut juuri sinua varten? Verkostoitumalla saat sähköpostiisi tietoa sinua kiinnostavista työmahdollisuuksista Fellowmindilla ja pääset seuraamaan arkeamme pintaa syvemmältä!

Verkostoidu kanssamme

Job_title: Data and integration professionals for industrial domain
Description:
Manufacturing industries are living in an era of accelerated change and rapid demand for renewal. Industrial digitalisation, servitization, green transition and recent volatility in economics are shaping the way organizations create value and interact with each other. Our mission is to support manufacturing businesses to turn the change into a competitive advantage with a comprehensive digital expertise that combines technology, data and human insight.
Our industrial customer portfolio consists of large enterprises and corporations from asset intensive process industries to world-class intelligent equipment OEMs. If you are a consultative data professional or technical data expert with manufacturing or R&D background, please consider joining our relaxed and caring community of 350+ data experts in Finland. In the era of hybrid work your physical location is less relevant but we do have offices and hubs in the largest cities of Finland: Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Oulu, Lahti, Jyväskylä, Joensuu, Kuopio and Pori.

Description:
BC Platforms: Building future health.
BC Platforms is a global leader in building data networks for the life sciences industry and provides versatile technology platforms for personalized medicine, accelerating the translation of innovations into clinical practice. We convert complex biological information collected in the healthcare setting into actionable insights. Our innovative technology creates a patient-centric infinity loop between the life sciences and healthcare sectors. Data we generate, harmonize, and manage, from diverse biobanks and healthcare institutions, is made accessible for pharmaceutical and biotech companies to enhance their core strengths in research and development. In parallel, we enable the stratification of patients towards targeted therapies, delivering on the promise of more personalized healthcare. Discover more at bcplatforms.com and follow us on LinkedIn @bc-platforms.

Job_title: Golang System Software Engineer - Containers / Virtualisation
Description:
We are hiring a Golang software engineer to work on the low level Go codebase sitting between our REST API and the low level C libraries used to manage containers and virtual machines. We are looking for system-level developers with experience in design and data management/modeling.
The LXD team is responsible for the design, development and evolution of LXD, a modern system container and virtual machine manager that is widely used on Ubuntu, ChromeOS and other Linux platforms. LXD components span the entire software stack from low-level kernel features to the upper level management REST API and CLI.
This is an opportunity for someone who wants to have a meaningful impact on modern cloud computing technologies. Canonical offers a fun, fast-paced team environment and a career full of learning and development.

Description:
Canonical is building a comprehensive automation suite to deliver a multi-cloud and on-premise data solution for the enterprise, which spans the full range of data stores and data technologies from big data, with Yugabyte, Spark and Kafka, through NoSQL and cache-layer capabilities like Redis, MongoDB and Opensearch, all the way to structured SQL engines like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an experienced software engineer passionate about delivering high quality, reliable and automated infrastructure based on open source software running on Kubernetes, the public cloud and bare-metal. We are facing the challenge of fault-tolerant mission critical distributed systems and intend to deliver the world's best automation solution for delivering data platforms.
Experience using data platform tools is desirable, but not over hands-on experience installing, configuring and operating such technologies.

Description:
Our flexible, diverse, and casual work environment stimulates change and creates a motivating environment with highly efficient people. As part of our team, you will be an integral part of creating and supporting our products. ADVA’s products are the building blocks for tomorrow’s networks, enabling the transport of increasing amounts of data across the globe. From access to the metro core, to the long haul, we create intelligent, software-automated solutions that will provide future generations with networks that can scale to meet increasing bandwidth demands. Come be a part of the world’s most cutting-edge innovative solutions and products, from design to implementation.
With a diverse team spread across the globe, we have developed a culture that embraces creativity and seeks innovation in every aspect of what we do. At ADVA, we believe in our TEAM members and work hard to ensure that every voice is always heard.
ADVA is dedicated to the health and well-being of our employees, therefore, a series of comprehensive, quality wellness programs are available to all employees. In addition to receiving an equitable salary and having an equal opportunity for professional development and advancement, as an ADVA employee, you may be eligible to enjoy other health benefits and perks, which will enhance your job satisfaction. We have designed our work and life programs around our employees because we know that they spend the majority of their life at work.

Description:
Drive the future of collaborative open source development tooling as part of the Launchpad team. This is an opportunity for a motivated engineer with a passion for open source software, Linux, and web services to join our distributed team.
Launchpad is a platform for managing open source development projects. It includes code hosting and review, bug tracking, package building, translations, and other facilities used by free and open source software developers. It provides essential development and collaboration infrastructure for major projects such as Ubuntu.
Launchpad is a mature project, mainly written in Python (primarily Zope, with some Flask). You'll be striking a balance between keeping our business-critical services running and expanding our feature set: among other things, we are currently working on expanding our package building capabilities, improving the development flows provided to our users, and modernising our web UI. If you love keeping large projects well-organised and well-maintained, care about supporting developers, and believe that continuous improvement is the key to innovation, higher velocity, and reliability, you'll fit right in.

Job_title: Senior Computer Vision Engineer (Barcodes) - Remote, Europe
Description:
Scandit is a high-growth tech scaleup from Switzerland with offices in Zurich, Boston, Warsaw, London, Singapore, Tokyo, and Tampere. Our market-leading smart data capture technology enables businesses to use any standard mobile phone to extract data from barcodes, ID documents, text, and objects. To see our software in action, check out our videos.
The barcode decoding team at Scandit builds cutting edge decoding solutions. Our mission is to replace every laser scanner in the world with a Scandit powered mobile app. In addition we provide computer vision components for all Scandit products including augmented reality and shelf monitoring.

About the Role

Description:
Skylo Technologies is hiring a Senior System Test Engineer onsite, in Espoo, Finland to implement a carrier-grade Satellite IoT network. This role will be highly cross-functional, working across the network engineering, wireless systems, and network operations teams. This is a terrific opportunity for someone who is interested to stretch themselves in their network domain, and see their work have immediate global impact in the wireless industry.
Responsibilities:
Plan, execute, and document tests to verify and validate Skylo NTN system behavior and performance, expose issues, and identify root causes
Work closely with the device, wireless systems, RAN, core and data mobility platform engineering teams and to execute system acceptance testing that will verify end-to-end functionality of the Skylo Non-terrestrial Networking (NTN) system

Description:
Toimipaikka Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Vaasa, Oulu, Lahti, Seinäjoki, Kuopio, Remote
Työkokemus Senior, Medior
Työsuhde Fulltime

Etsimme mukavaan ja kasvavaan joukkoomme kokenutta Data Engineeriä auttamaan asiakkaitamme menestymään modernien Data Platform -ratkaisujemme avulla. Roolissasi kokeneena tekijänä pääset paitsi luomaan merkityksellisiä dataratkaisuja asiakkaillemme myös jakamaan osaamistasi, kehittämään toimintamalleja sekä vaikuttamaan miten rakennamme ratkaisujamme tulevaisuudessa.

Fellowmindin tiedon hallinnan ratkaisut perustuvat erityisesti Azuren dataratkaisuihin (Data Factory, Synapse Analytics), joten arvostamme sinulta näiden tuntemusta. Odotamme sinulta kokemusta ja näkemystä isojen datakokonaisuuksien käsittelystä ja kehittämisestä sekä Data Engineering kokemusta siitä miten dataa hyödynnetäään osana operatiivista järjestelmää. Toivomme myös, että integraatiot, SQL ja DW -ratkaisut ovat sinulle tuttuja.

Arvostamme, että kokeneena osaajana jaat aihealueen osaamista sparraten nuorempia datataiteen harjoittajia ja tukien myyntiä pre-sales roolissa. Keskustelemme mielellämme siitä, että voisit ottaa Competence Lead -tason vastuita valituista kokonaisuuksista.

Vahva konsulttihenkisyys ja yhteistyökyky antaa sinulle hyvät eväät menestyä työssäsi, sillä työskentelet tiiviisti asiakkaiden eri aihealueen konsulttien kanssa. Asiakkaidemme ja ympäristömme kansainvälistyessä toivomme sinulta suomen lisäksi myös sujuvaa englannin kielen taitoa.

Miksi valitsisit juuri meidät?

Tarjoamme mahdollisuuden päästä kehittymään ja oppimaan uutta merkityksellisten asiakasprojektien parissa. Fellowmindin koulutuskonseptien (Academy, MasterClass) myötä voimme tarjota sinulle erinomaiset mahdollisuudet jakaa osaamistasi ja oppia itse uutta. Mitä uuta sinä haluaisit oppia?

Datanäkemyksemme on vahvasti asiakkaan liiketoimintaan keskittyvä; olemme ratkaisemassa asiakkaidemme ydinhaasteita. Taustallamme on kasvava ja tunnustettu tarina Suomen ykkösrivistössä, ja voimakkaasti kasvanut asiakaskuntamme on kestävällä pohjalla. Lue lisää referensseistämme esimerkiksi logistiikan, lastenvaatteiden tai vaikka vakuutusliiketoiminnan parissa.

Työskentelyysi saat vastuullisen ja itsenäisen työnkuvan sekä tiimin täyden tuen arjessa. Pääset myös tuomaan näkemyksesi miten ratkaisuja rakennetaan, myydään ja tarjotaan tulevaisuudessa. Roolia voidaan kehittää ja rakentaa osaamisesi mukaan. Meillä Fellowmindilla ei tarvitse lokeroitua boksiin!

Fellowmindilta saat myös paikan isossa kaveriporukassa! Meillä arvot eivät ole pelkkä johtoryhmän tai konsernin kasaama muodollisuus, sillä “People at Heart” toteutuu ja näkyy jokapäiväisessä tekemisessä. Teemme parhaamme, että tulet toimistolle hymyillen myöskin syksyn harmaassa aamussa.

Pasi Lepistö

Autan mielelläni, jos sinulle heräsi kysymyksiä Fellowmindin avoimista työpaikoista tai Fellowmindista työnantajana.

puh. 050 490 3670 pasi.lepisto@fellowmind.fi


Kiinnostaisiko käydä kuukausittain tunnin hieronnassa firman piikkiin taikka hankkia työsuhdepyörä? Meillä saat perinteisen lounasedun lisäksi käyttöösi Epassi Flexin (600 €/v), jonka voi käyttää haluamallasi tavalla harrastuksiin, kulttuuriin, hammaslääkäriin tai vaikka julkiseen liikenteeseen. Toimiston rahka/välipalakaapin antimet pelastavat, kun nälkä yllättää ja kuntosalijäsenyys on kaikille halukkaille otettu. Laaja työterveyssopimus kanssa sekä Auntie -palvelu tukee ihmisten hyvinvointia ja terveyttä. Opiskelemista ja itsensä kehittämistä tuetaan opiskelurahalla sekä Academy-konseptin kautta. Etuja siis piisaa ja valikoimaa kehitetään, hyvät ideat meillä on tapana toteuttaa.

Mikä Fellowmind?

Fellowmind on modernien liiketoimintajärjestelmien, pilvi- ja tietoturvaratkaisujen, datan ja tekoälyn sekä modernin työskentelyn asiantuntijayritys. Fellowmind on Euroopan johtavia Microsoft-kumppaneita ja toimii Suomessa, Ruotsissa, Tanskassa, Hollannissa, Saksassa ja Puolassa 35 eri toimipisteessä. Yrityksessä työskentelee 1750 asiantuntijaa. Fellowmind on perustettu vuonna 2005 ja sen pääomistaja on Pohjois-Euroopan johtava pääomasijoittaja FSN Capital.

Haluamme olla paitsi asiakkaidemme tulevaisuuden liiketoiminnan mahdollistaja, mutta myös työpaikka, jossa panostetaan ihmisten osaamisen kehittämiseen ja hyvinvointiin. Fellowmindilaisia työskentelee Suomen toimipisteissä Helsingissä, Tampereella, Jyväskylässä, Lahdessa, Vaasassa, Turussa, Kuopiossa, Seinäjoella ja Oulussa.

Verkostoidu kanssamme

Eikö tämä rooli ollut juuri sinua varten? Verkostoitumalla saat sähköpostiisi tietoa sinua kiinnostavista työmahdollisuuksista Fellowmindilla ja pääset seuraamaan arkeamme pintaa syvemmältä!

Verkostoidu kanssamme

Tule meille Azure Data Engineeriksi tehostamaan asiakkaidemme liiketoimintaa. Projektimme vaihtelevat laajasti ja asiakkaita onkin eri kokoisissa organisaatoissa monella eri toimialalla. Yhteistä kaikille on kuitenkin se, että he tarvitsevat meidän apuamme ja sinun tiedoillasi ja taidoillasi on suuri merkitys projektien onnistumisessa ja asiakkaiden haasteiden ratkaisemisessa. Tule siis mukaan tekemään työtä, jolla on merkitystä.
Data Engineerinä osaat kääntää asiakkaidemme liiketoimintatarpeet teknisiksi ratkaisuiksi, joita pääset myös itse toteuttamaan. Suunnittelet ja rakennat asiakkaillemme Azure-pohjaisia integraatio- ja tietovarastoratkaisuja, joissa hyödynnät osaamistasi esimerkiksi Data Vault -mallinnusmenetelmästä. Oman osaamisesi mukaan voit olla mukana tekemässä hands-on konfiguraatioita, asennuksia ja skriptauksia sekä suunnittelemassa arkkitehtuureja. Eduksi katsomme myös osaamisen tai ymmärryksen tietovarastojen optimoimisesta tai Snowflake-osaamisesta.

Description:
L2/L3 Firmware Engineer
System Engineering
Finland R&D Center
Design the future. Every day.
We are on a mission in taking the world into a new future. Connecting it and enabling new ways of seeing it. By the power of curiosity and passion, using technology, and in full partnership - we lead change day by day. Our vision is built by individuals, connected to one another. We are in the business of creating our own reality, when it’s the daily effort that counts – for an exciting future, one we wish to live in.
Responsibilities
L2/L3 FIRMWARE ENGINEER
As a L2/L3 firmware engineer you will be responsible for developing and integration of the firmware layers running in the modem of a Cellular IoT product. This firmware, referred to as LTE/5G Protocol Stack, consists of multiple layers, implementing the communication protocols. The firmware is written in C, running on RISC in an RTOS environment. The term ‘Stack’ herein below typically refers to Data and Control planes, but the team is also involved with platform SW development.
You will also be involved in hands-on software feature set design, implementation, and integration with the entire protocol stack. The Stack is complex and your ability to grasp the overall architecture and dig into other software components will assist you to guide the team to debug and pin-point issues found during integration process and after. You will be also discussing and agreeing on APIs and software implementation with the System architects, analyzing performance, making sure functions conforms to the specifications and meet the KPIs.
The platform you will be working is on Altair’s newest chipset, designed especially for the IoT market, highly integrated and consuming super low power.
You will have the chance to work with experienced team as a part of Sony family. We co-work with teams in Israel within same time zone. Our local Branch in Oulu consists of 30 colleagues, so you do not have to deal with bureaucracy and you can focus on the essential. Our office space is modern and we have a flexible working policy regarding remote work.
We do have competitive salary and we help you with relocation if needed.

Description:
Your chance to join as one of kicker.cloud's first employees is now.
Who?
kicker.cloud is a B2B SaaS startup streamlining processes and enhancing data usage in large scale investment transactions. We help companies achieve operational efficiencies, reduce risk, and build a base for data analytics. The solution is tailored to the private finance sector (e.g. PE, PD, M&A), with applications far beyond. Our mission is to remove the systemic inefficiencies in the industry by applying cutting edge technologies to real problems.
The founding team have years of experience working in investment roles and building enterprise level systems in top organisations in London and New York. We are a new team growing to 6-7 people in the coming months.

Join Eaton and help us provide energy-efficient solutions that have a real impact on the environment. We make what matters work. Find out more on https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=baa_aiJ4L7E

The Eaton Summer Trainee campaign has kicked off and we are again hiring new colleagues for Summer 2023! We offer you an attractive position with a proper induction to your assignments in an inclusive and diverse organization in Espoo. You will spend your Summer gaining great learning experiences in our World Class teams. Join us as Summer trainee and start your journey to make what matters work!
At Eaton, we aim to improve the quality of life and the environment using power management technologies and services. We hold onto the talent and we value the fresh ideas that our summer trainees introduce us and bring along, which is why there are opportunities to continue working with us also after summer. We support you to combine your work and studies seamlessly; numerous students work on their theses with us each year.

Description:
Are you passionate about software quality and embedded systems? Are you a quick learner well suited for an international work environment? Are you a junior test engineer looking for a place to develop your skills or an established professional looking for the next step in your career?
We are looking for driven, self-guided embedded software experts at different stages of their careers to join our team. We offer you the freedom to create a career that looks like yourself and responsibilities to match your ambitions. The sky is the limit (literally)!
Who we are
We are a technology and design house full of independent thinkers and keen learners with humane hearts and bold attitudes. We are from different educational backgrounds and ethnic groups coming in all ages, shapes, and sizes. What unites us is our passion to pave way for a more humane and bold tomorrow for both people and our planet – with a twinkle in our eye.

Description:
At the moment we are looking for Machine Learning Engineer to join our team in Helsinki to work on developing next-generation computer vision (CV) and natural language processing (NLP) technologies. The responsibility involves working with various problems related to CV and NLP but is not limited to object recognition, video understanding, OCR, natural language analysis, and visual-language multimodal. You will join a close-knit team of highly accomplished researchers and research engineers to deliver cutting-edge technologies that impact millions of users.
As a member of this team, you will use your deep understanding of your engineering skills to tackle meaningful technical problems and collaborate with the world’s most innovative product development teams. Together with other researchers, you will perform designing, implementing, and optimizing CV/NLP/ML algorithms to tackle new challenges and hardware capabilities in large model training. You will have the opportunity to transfer your knowledge into solutions for some of the most challenging technical problems in the next generation products.

Job_title: Software Engineer (experience in computer security) Abu Dhabi
Description:
While a lot is being done to discover security vulnerabilities in software via several bug bounty programs, the state of software security is not getting improve at the same pace. One possible reason could be that the momentum is not that high in automated tools and techniques for various security related tasks. It is mostly done manually by experts. In this role, you will be tasked with developing automated techniques that address security challenges spanning from automated detection of vulnerabilities to automated bug patching, given a binary executable.
Another dimension to consider is to leverage recent advancements in hardware assisted security features (e.g. Intel CET, ARM memory tagging) to make software analyses scale well with reasonable overhead. As a researcher, you will establish your project in the related theme and work with existing researchers and engineers with a possible collaboration with top universities across the globe. We do expect (and encourage) high quality publications as milestones of your project/work in top security venues, Usenix Sec, NDSS, IEEE S&P, CCS, ACSAC,RAID etc.

Description:
You: Ambitious programmer equipped with deep technical knowledge craving to apply it in an environment of trust and independence where ownership of what you do is a given.

We: Supercell's Services Team
Our team develops shared systems, tools, platforms and services for Supercell games and player experience teams. These systems include live-ops tools to manage in-game campaigns and data processing pipelines that ingest billions of game events daily.

We aim to design long-term solutions that are flexible, scalable, secure, and yet only require minimal maintenance. An engineer able to build such systems should have extensive technical expertise, the ability to work independently, and the commitment to follow through on big ideas. You want to and are capable of designing the architecture of large cloud-based systems from scratch, executing the implementation, and carrying out the operation of the system throughout its entire lifespan.

Description:
Aalto University is where science and art meet technology and business. We shape a sustainable future by making research breakthroughs in and across our disciplines, sparking the game changers of tomorrow and creating novel solutions to major global challenges. Our community is made up of 12 000 students, 400 professors and close to 4 000 other faculty and staff working on our dynamic campus in Espoo and at the Metsähovi Radio Observatory in Kirkkonummi, Finland. Diversity is part of who we are, and we actively work to ensure our community’s diversity and inclusiveness. This is why we warmly encourage qualified candidates from all backgrounds to join our community.
We are looking for two Research Engineers for Aalto University Metsähovi Radio Observatory.
Metsähovi Radio Observatory
is the only astronomical radio observatory in Finland and one of the very few in Europe. We operate several radio telescopes and other radio-frequency equipment to carry out astronomical observations literally 24/7, every day of the year. Our specialities include long-term radio monitoring of active galactic nuclei and the Sun at millimetre-wavelengths, and we frequently participate in Very Long Baseline Interferometric (VLBI) observations in global radio telescope networks. The main frequencies range from 22 to 86 GHz (with observing capabilities up to 150 GHz) for the main 14-m radio telescope, with other antennas operating between 50 MHz and 12 GHz. The radio observatory is located in Kirkkonummi, some 35 kilometres from the university main campus, inside a radio-quiet zone.

Description:
We are looking for full-stack engineer to join our growing software engineering team.

Top Data Science is a Helsinki based data science company focusing on AI powered Computer Vision, Machine Learning and Analytics technologies and development services for corporate customers and technology companies.

Since 2018, Top Data Science has been part of Morpho Group. Established in 2004, Morpho Inc. is a global leader in image processing and imaging AI solutions, with headquarters in Tokyo, Japan and listed on Tokyo Stock Exchange.

Toimipaikka Helsinki, Tampere, Turku, Jyväskylä, Vaasa, Oulu, Lahti, Seinäjoki, Kuopio, Remote
Työkokemus Senior, Medior
Työsuhde Fulltime

Etsimme mukavaan ja kasvavaan joukkoomme kokenutta Data Engineeriä auttamaan asiakkaitamme menestymään modernien Data Platform -ratkaisujemme avulla. Roolissasi kokeneena tekijänä pääset paitsi luomaan merkityksellisiä dataratkaisuja asiakkaillemme myös jakamaan osaamistasi, kehittämään toimintamalleja sekä vaikuttamaan miten rakennamme ratkaisujamme tulevaisuudessa.

Fellowmindin tiedon hallinnan ratkaisut perustuvat erityisesti Azuren dataratkaisuihin (Data Factory, Synapse Analytics), joten arvostamme sinulta näiden tuntemusta. Odotamme sinulta kokemusta ja näkemystä isojen datakokonaisuuksien käsittelystä ja kehittämisestä sekä Data Engineering kokemusta siitä miten dataa hyödynnetäään osana operatiivista järjestelmää. Toivomme myös, että integraatiot, SQL ja DW -ratkaisut ovat sinulle tuttuja.

Arvostamme, että kokeneena osaajana jaat aihealueen osaamista sparraten nuorempia datataiteen harjoittajia ja tukien myyntiä pre-sales roolissa. Keskustelemme mielellämme siitä, että voisit ottaa Competence Lead -tason vastuita valituista kokonaisuuksista.

Vahva konsulttihenkisyys ja yhteistyökyky antaa sinulle hyvät eväät menestyä työssäsi, sillä työskentelet tiiviisti asiakkaiden eri aihealueen konsulttien kanssa. Asiakkaidemme ja ympäristömme kansainvälistyessä toivomme sinulta suomen lisäksi myös sujuvaa englannin kielen taitoa.

Miksi valitsisit juuri meidät?

Tarjoamme mahdollisuuden päästä kehittymään ja oppimaan uutta merkityksellisten asiakasprojektien parissa. Fellowmindin koulutuskonseptien (Academy, MasterClass) myötä voimme tarjota sinulle erinomaiset mahdollisuudet jakaa osaamistasi ja oppia itse uutta. Mitä uuta sinä haluaisit oppia?

Datanäkemyksemme on vahvasti asiakkaan liiketoimintaan keskittyvä; olemme ratkaisemassa asiakkaidemme ydinhaasteita. Taustallamme on kasvava ja tunnustettu tarina Suomen ykkösrivistössä, ja voimakkaasti kasvanut asiakaskuntamme on kestävällä pohjalla. Lue lisää referensseistämme esimerkiksi logistiikan, lastenvaatteiden tai vaikka vakuutusliiketoiminnan parissa.

Työskentelyysi saat vastuullisen ja itsenäisen työnkuvan sekä tiimin täyden tuen arjessa. Pääset myös tuomaan näkemyksesi miten ratkaisuja rakennetaan, myydään ja tarjotaan tulevaisuudessa. Roolia voidaan kehittää ja rakentaa osaamisesi mukaan. Meillä Fellowmindilla ei tarvitse lokeroitua boksiin!

Fellowmindilta saat myös paikan isossa kaveriporukassa! Meillä arvot eivät ole pelkkä johtoryhmän tai konsernin kasaama muodollisuus, sillä “People at Heart” toteutuu ja näkyy jokapäiväisessä tekemisessä. Teemme parhaamme, että tulet toimistolle hymyillen myöskin syksyn harmaassa aamussa.

Pasi Lepistö

Autan mielelläni, jos sinulle heräsi kysymyksiä Fellowmindin avoimista työpaikoista tai Fellowmindista työnantajana.

puh. 050 490 3670 pasi.lepisto@fellowmind.fi


Kiinnostaisiko käydä kuukausittain tunnin hieronnassa firman piikkiin taikka hankkia työsuhdepyörä? Meillä saat perinteisen lounasedun lisäksi käyttöösi Epassi Flexin (600 €/v), jonka voi käyttää haluamallasi tavalla harrastuksiin, kulttuuriin, hammaslääkäriin tai vaikka julkiseen liikenteeseen. Toimiston rahka/välipalakaapin antimet pelastavat, kun nälkä yllättää ja kuntosalijäsenyys on kaikille halukkaille otettu. Laaja työterveyssopimus kanssa sekä Auntie -palvelu tukee ihmisten hyvinvointia ja terveyttä. Opiskelemista ja itsensä kehittämistä tuetaan opiskelurahalla sekä Academy-konseptin kautta. Etuja siis piisaa ja valikoimaa kehitetään, hyvät ideat meillä on tapana toteuttaa.

Mikä Fellowmind?

Fellowmind on modernien liiketoimintajärjestelmien, pilvi- ja tietoturvaratkaisujen, datan ja tekoälyn sekä modernin työskentelyn asiantuntijayritys. Fellowmind on Euroopan johtavia Microsoft-kumppaneita ja toimii Suomessa, Ruotsissa, Tanskassa, Hollannissa, Saksassa ja Puolassa 35 eri toimipisteessä. Yrityksessä työskentelee 1750 asiantuntijaa. Fellowmind on perustettu vuonna 2005 ja sen pääomistaja on Pohjois-Euroopan johtava pääomasijoittaja FSN Capital.

Haluamme olla paitsi asiakkaidemme tulevaisuuden liiketoiminnan mahdollistaja, mutta myös työpaikka, jossa panostetaan ihmisten osaamisen kehittämiseen ja hyvinvointiin. Fellowmindilaisia työskentelee Suomen toimipisteissä Helsingissä, Tampereella, Jyväskylässä, Lahdessa, Vaasassa, Turussa, Kuopiossa, Seinäjoella ja Oulussa.

Verkostoidu kanssamme

Eikö tämä rooli ollut juuri sinua varten? Verkostoitumalla saat sähköpostiisi tietoa sinua kiinnostavista työmahdollisuuksista Fellowmindilla ja pääset seuraamaan arkeamme pintaa syvemmältä!

Verkostoidu kanssamme

Description:
Your chance to join as one of kicker.cloud's first employees is now.
Who?
kicker.cloud is a B2B SaaS startup streamlining processes and enhancing data usage in large scale investment transactions. We help companies achieve operational efficiencies, reduce risk, and build a base for data analytics. The solution is tailored to the private finance sector (e.g. PE, PD, M&A), with applications far beyond. Our mission is to remove the systemic inefficiencies in the industry by applying cutting edge technologies to real problems.
The founding team have years of experience working in investment roles and building enterprise level systems in top organisations in London and New York. We are a new team growing to 6-7 people in the coming months.

Join Eaton and help us provide energy-efficient solutions that have a real impact on the environment. We make what matters work. Find out more on https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=baa_aiJ4L7E

The Eaton Summer Trainee campaign has kicked off and we are again hiring new colleagues for Summer 2023! We offer you an attractive position with a proper induction to your assignments in an inclusive and diverse organization in Espoo. You will spend your Summer gaining great learning experiences in our World Class teams. Join us as Summer trainee and start your journey to make what matters work!
At Eaton, we aim to improve the quality of life and the environment using power management technologies and services. We hold onto the talent and we value the fresh ideas that our summer trainees introduce us and bring along, which is why there are opportunities to continue working with us also after summer. We support you to combine your work and studies seamlessly; numerous students work on their theses with us each year.

Description:
Onko data edellä -ajattelu sinulle arkipäivää? Haluaisitko olla mukana kehittämässä ja rakentamassa modernia data-alustaa, joka helpottaisi hoiva- ja sosiaalialan ammattilaisten arjen työtä? Oletko kerryttänyt osaamista projektityöskentelystä? Etsimme Attendon tietohallintoon vakituiseen työsuhteeseen dataosaajaa, jolla on kiinnostusta data-arkkitehtuuria kohtaan. Roolissasi tulet työskentelemään läheisessä yhteistyössä liiketoiminnan ja muun tietohallinnon kanssa osana tiimiämme.
Arkkitehtuuri- ja ratkaisupalvelut tiimissämme on tällä hetkellä kuusi kokenutta asiantuntijaa, jotka vastaavat meillä mm. datasta, integraatioista, teknologiasta, Microsoftin M365-ympäristöstä sekä palvelinympäristöstämme. Tiimin tarkoituksena on helpottaa attendolaisten työtä ja parantaa Attendo-kotien asukkaiden kokemusta arjessa. Suunnittelemme ja kehitämme ympäristöämme jatkuvasti olemalla tiiviisti mukana liiketoimintaprojekteissa yhdessä muiden tietohallinnon ja palvelutoiminnon henkilöiden kanssa. Tällä hetkellä suurimpana työn alla olevana hankkeenamme on datan hyödyntäminen. Data edellä -ajattelu tulee tulevaisuudessa vain kasvamaan Attendolla, joten tähän liittyviä projekteja on tiedossa myös tulevaisuudessa.

Job_title: Software Engineer (experience in computer security) Abu Dhabi
Description:
While a lot is being done to discover security vulnerabilities in software via several bug bounty programs, the state of software security is not getting improve at the same pace. One possible reason could be that the momentum is not that high in automated tools and techniques for various security related tasks. It is mostly done manually by experts. In this role, you will be tasked with developing automated techniques that address security challenges spanning from automated detection of vulnerabilities to automated bug patching, given a binary executable.
Another dimension to consider is to leverage recent advancements in hardware assisted security features (e.g. Intel CET, ARM memory tagging) to make software analyses scale well with reasonable overhead. As a researcher, you will establish your project in the related theme and work with existing researchers and engineers with a possible collaboration with top universities across the globe. We do expect (and encourage) high quality publications as milestones of your project/work in top security venues, Usenix Sec, NDSS, IEEE S&P, CCS, ACSAC,RAID etc.

Description:
Company Description

About Bosch Sensortec
Bosch Sensortec is the technology leader in sensing solutions based on microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) and dedicated to the consumer electronics world. for smartphone applications, tablets, video game consoles, wearables, and the Internet of Things. The sensors enable devices to recognize their surroundings and to transmit the data collected. MEMS are therefore part of the foundation for a networked world. Our success in MEMS sensors and solutions is built on a remarkable team driven by passion, innovation and flexibility.
Here at Bosch, we are creating the future by inventing technologies and services of high quality that can enrich peoples' lives. Our promise to our employees is solid: we grow together, we enjoy our work, and we inspire each other. Join us and feel the difference!

Description:
What to expect from this role?
We make sense of our customers' RFID data – you ensure our tailor-made RFID systems depict these data meaningfully.
A key element in our track and trace platform is the Turck Vilant Server, which collects and analyses data from a fixed and mobile RFID reader network. In addition, it provides a web-based user interface that, e.g., visualizes the movement of RFID-tagged assets for the user. It will be your task to develop further and design the front end of our Server applications.
You will join our skilled software team in Otaniemi, Espoo. The team works in a hybrid mode, partly from their home offices and partly from the office, so it will be up to you to choose where and how you would like to work, bearing in mind that we would like to see you at the office at a minimum once per week.

Description:
Ready to start the next chapter in your career journey? You’re in the right place. We’re always happy to hear from people who are eager to learn and grow, and share our values. Welcome home.
As a Data Engineer you get a deep-dive into clients’ data!
We hope you are ready to get your hands dirty with designing, building, automating and operating data platforms and data pipelines. It’s all about putting your mind into automating infrastructure, monitoring and recovery routines. Overall, the key is being curious, solving problems and recognising how to interact with different types of data and people. All the work we do is about helping and guiding our clients, so having a true consultant mindset and interest in supporting sales is what we value dearly.
In our work as consultants we give high fives to agile ways of working and the importance of transparency and trust in teamwork. As a Data Engineer you have talented professionals around you such as data scientists, software developers, designers and of course our clients and their end-users. You will work with a variety of projects, domains and business cases; Lately, we have been working with data architecture of a media company, building a real-time chat spam detector for a gaming company, and making data more accessible on a governmental organization.
