Description:
Lifetimely is a SaaS company looking for an experienced Ruby on Rails engineer to help build out our SaaS product serving 6000+ e-commerce stores. Our users include names like MrBeast's snacking brand Feastables, Liquid Death, and Colgate.

You can read about our app on the Shopify app store (https://apps.shopify.com/lifetimely-lifetime-value-and-profit-analytics/). We provide real-time reporting to ecommerce shop owners. To give you a sense of scale - we collect data on millions of orders per day from thousands of ecommerce stores and process many millions of background jobs to be able to deliver quality reporting and insights to our customers.
We're looking to add a great backend RoR developer to our existing team.

Infotainment systems are constantly evolving with new functions and highly interconnected features. To ensure the systems meet the high-quality standards of end customers in time for market launch Unikie is now looking for Embedded SW Engineer (Infotainment Systems) to our Kuopio office.

Would you like to:
Build new solutions for our customers?
Collaborate along with colleagues who are the top in their field and together with our customers to strive for understanding what they need?
Develop and challenge yourself and learn more from experienced software talents?

Job_title: Senior Aircraft Structures Engineer - Finland or Spain
Description:
Position: Senior Aircraft Structures Engineer
Location: Finland or Spain
Hiring Model: Office
Who are we?
We are a Finnish-based international Aerospace company with employees from over 57 countries in Finland, the US, the UK, Spain, Luxembourg, and Poland. Our team is a tight-knit group of experts from areas including engineering, software development, and radar technology. We’re innovative, driven people who strive for excellence in everything we do. As advocates of our corporate culture, we value teamwork and curiosity and know how to have fun!
What do you think we should do?
ICEYE is building and operating its commercial constellation of small Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellites with SAR data available to customers. Our satellites acquire images of Earth at any time – even when it’s cloudy or dark – providing commercial and government partners with unmatched persistent monitoring capabilities. Information derived from our SAR images helps customers make data-driven decisions to address time-critical challenges in various sectors, such as maritime, disaster management, insurance, and finance.

We are currently developing a new Unmanned Air Vehicle (UAV) with the goal of expanding our fleet of earth observation platforms. As one of the company's next steps after the successful development and establishment of our continuously growing SAR satellite fleet, we are focusing on the development of a long endurance aircraft, following the industry's technological cutting edge and spotlight on high altitude pseudo-satellite (HAPS) platforms.
We seek a Senior Aircraft Structures Engineer to join our Team in Espoo, Finland, to support the company's growth.


ICEYE is seeking a Mechanical or Aeronautical Engineer with a robust aircraft structure design and analysis background to join its aircraft development team. As an Senior Aircraft Structure Engineer, you will design, prototype, and test structural and non-structural ultra-lightweight mechanical components for ICEYE’s HAPS UAV.
You will be part of a small, dedicated team facing an exciting challenge. You will get to work with world-leading aerospace and mechanical engineers on a UAV project that has a real impact and will set a new mark on aviation history. You will enjoy a transparent, open, and inclusive work culture. This is the beginning of a team that’s intended to grow fast. Thus, it offers substantial growth opportunities.






Could this be the role for you? You can apply to start your journey with ICEYE.
We are making the impossible possible together.

Riya Vidhani (Talent Acquisition Partner)

Position: Senior Remote Sensing Engineer
Location: Espoo, Finland, remote
Hiring Model: Hybrid
Who are we?
We are a Finnish-based international New Space company with employees from more than 57 nationalities. Our team is a tight-knit group of experts from areas including engineering, software development, and radar technology. We’re innovative, driven people who strive for excellence in everything we do. Being advocates of our corporate culture, we value teamwork and curiosity, and we know how to have fun!
What do we do?
ICEYE is building and operating its commercial constellation of small Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellites with SAR data available to customers. Our satellites acquire images of Earth at any time – even when it’s cloudy or dark – providing commercial and government partners with unmatched persistent monitoring capabilities. Information derived from our SAR images helps customers make data-driven decisions to address time-critical challenges in various sectors, such as maritime, disaster management, insurance, and finance.
What are we looking for?
We are looking for a Senior Remote Sensing Engineer to help develop and experiment with new solutions leveraging SAR imagery. You will report to the Analytics Director of R&D.
As a Senior Remote Sensing Engineer, you will help establish workflows that leverage geospatial data in a variety of formats and remote sensing image processing techniques to support the development and implementation of ICEYE business solutions in the domain of wildfire/natural catastrophe monitoring. You are a resourceful and applied engineer keen to apply your expertise to new areas in remote sensing, but also willing to dig in and help with the execution of existing workflows. You will help to establish new techniques, fusing SAR and other remotely sensed data, to create state-of-the-art wildfire monitoring solutions.

Description:
Position: Senior Cat Modeler (Flood)
Location: Espoo, Finland, remote
Hiring Model: Hybrid
Who are we?
We are a Finnish-based international New Space company with employees from more than 57 nationalities. Our team is a tight-knit group of experts from areas including engineering, software development, and radar technology. We’re innovative, driven people who strive for excellence in everything we do. Being advocates of our corporate culture, we value teamwork and curiosity, and we know how to have fun!
What do we do?
ICEYE is building and operating its commercial constellation of small Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) satellites with SAR data available to customers. Our satellites acquire images of Earth at any time – even when it’s cloudy or dark – providing commercial and government partners with unmatched persistent monitoring capabilities. Information derived from our SAR images helps customers make data-driven decisions to address time-critical challenges in various sectors, such as maritime, disaster management, insurance, and finance.
What are we looking for?
We are seeking a Senior Catastrophe Modeler with a specialization in floods to join our team. In this role you will be responsible for developing, implementing and validating cat models for floods leveraging ICEYE’s archive of flood peril data. You will provided critical models and insights to support our client’s risk management and decision-making processes.

About the role?

The successful candidate will have deep experience with risk management, reinsurance, property insurance and underwriting and will have expert knowledge of catastrophe loss models and loss modeling frameworks. You are passionate about research and development of scientific-based natural catastrophe model solutions, and finding new ways that ICEYE peril data can be leveraged for loss and vulnerability / risk modeling. You will report to the Staff Engineer Team Lead in the Analytics team.
Responsibilities
You will help to create an architecture for the ingestion of ICEYE flood peril data for loss and vulnerability / risk modelling. You will use remote sensing data to advance the state of the art in catastrophe loss modelling. You will play a critical role in analyzing and interpreting flood data, utilizing your expertise to develop accurate and effective models.



Diversity& inclusion are core values at ICEYE. We are passionate about building and sustaining inclusive and equitable working and learning environments for all staff. We believe every member on our team enriches our diversity by exposing us to a broad range of ways to understand and engage with the world, identify challenges, and discover, design, and deliver solutions.
